message: Let's split 70/30.  It's a good deal for you in the first round, Bob!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. How about a 60/40 split? This still gives you a good share.
The clock is ticking, Bob. 65/35 is my final offer.
Okay, Alice, I'm willing to compromise. 55/45.  Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more!
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. 60/40 is my last offer.  Take it or leave it.
